    Methods in io.luverolla.gradi.structures that return Filter
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected Filter<E,​?> EntityService.getFilter​(Map.Entry<String,​?> m)
    Gets an instance of the right filter, from the Filters map, according to filter rule Filter rule is a (key, value) map, where: key is the property we want to filter by value is the value, or the values, the filter takes as arguments
